CustomField.description: FLOW ONLY: Used to capture information in questionnaire to help show what would potentially cause or provide a reason for a person to be involved in the incident or any suffering. It is specific to the associated cause of not being a direct victim but having someone suffer because of a victim. I.e. Fire fighter, family members of patient, third party employee that was exposed, etc.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The associated reason a person may have been involed with a case.
CustomField.label: Associated Cause
